l3fwRegionErrorStatus Struct Reference
IP » L3 Firewall

Structure contains configuration parameters for L3 FW region. More...

#include <l3fw.h>

Detailed Description

Structure contains configuration parameters for L3 FW region.

Field Documentation

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::accessType

Transaction type. 0 => READ or 1 => WRITE

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::addrOffset

First Address hit by invalid access User needs to multiply by 2 in case of interleaved EMIF configuration

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::blockBurstViolation

2D burst not allowed or exceeding allowed size

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::connIdMSB4bit

ConnId of type halL3fwL3ConnId which made the invalid access This ID will be 4bit connID (upper 4 bits of 6bit connID).

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::errorEndRegion

Region ID hit by invalid access

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::errorStartRegion

Region ID hit by invalid access

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::mReqDebug

Functional/Debug mode 0 => Functional 1 => Debug

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::mReqSupervisor

Access mode 1 => Privilege or 0 => USER

uint32_t l3fwRegionErrorStatus::mReqType

Access type 0 => processor data access 1 => processor instruction fetch,
